text: Rashidi may refer to: * Rashidi dynasty, ruling family in Arabia == People == * Ahmed Rashidi, Moroccan extrajudicial prisoner of the United States * Ali Muhammad Rashidi (1905–1987), Pakistani politician * Davoud Rashidi (1933–2016), Iranian actor * Rouzbeh Rashidi (born 1980), Iranian avant-garde filmmaker * Runoko Rashidi (born 1954), American historian * Seif Rashidi (born 1957), Tanzanian politician == Places == * Rashidi, Iran, a village in Lorestan Province ==See also== * Al-Rashid (disambiguation) Category:Iranian- language surnames
title: Rashidi
